title: Marcus Peters on Lamar Jackson-Michael Vick comparisons, Ravens defense, video games (Football 5/2)
description:
Baltimore Ravens defensive back Marcus Peters joins Will Brinson to discuss life on and off the field. The guys chat video games, his arrival with the Ravens, Lamar Jackson's greatness, Joe Burrow getting drafted into the division, the real 'DBU' and more.
Check out twitch.tv/budlight at 9 pm ET on Sunday for the Bud Light Seltzer Charity Royale Tournament, featuring top athletes to raise money for important charities that are helping those on the frontlines during these uncertain times.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
